title: Introduction
features: Welcome to "Undiscovered Recruits" ("the App"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile and web applications.
By accessing or using the App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

title: Information We Collect
features: Personal Information
We may collect the following personal information from users:
Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number.
Profile Information: Photos, videos, biography, sports preferences, school information.
Account Information: Username, password, login credentials.
Payment Information: Credit card details, billing address (for subscription services).
Usage Data
We may collect information on how the App is accessed and used, including:
Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers.
Usage Details: Pages viewed, time spent on pages, navigation paths, search queries.
Location Data: Approximate location based on IP address.
Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our App and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

title: How We Use Your Information
features: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
To Provide and Maintain the App: Ensuring the functionality and security of the App.
To Improve User Experience: Personalizing content, improving navigation, and tailoring features based on user preferences.
To Facilitate Communication: Enabling messaging between coaches and players, sending notifications and announcements.
To Manage Subscriptions: Processing payments, managing subscription plans, providing customer support.
To Conduct Analytics: Analyzing usage patterns to improve our services and develop new features.
To Ensure Compliance: Complying with legal obligations, enforcing our terms and conditions, and protecting our rights.

title: Sharing Your Information
features: We may share your information in the following situations:
With Other Users: Coaches and players may share information with each other through profiles, messages, and media uploads.
With Service Providers: Third-party service providers who assist us in operating the App, processing payments, or conducting analytics.
For Legal Reasons: To comply with legal obligations, respond to requests from public authorities, or protect our legal rights.

title: Data Security
features: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

title: Data Retention
features: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

title: Your Rights
features: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
Access: Request access to your personal data.
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data.
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data.
Objection: Object to the processing of your personal data.
Restriction: Request restriction of processing your personal data.
Data Portability: Request transfer of your personal data to another party.
To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@undiscoveredrecruits.com.

title: Children's Privacy
features: The App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13.
We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13.
If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.

title: International Data Transfers
features: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction.
By providing us with your information, you consent to these transfers.

title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
features: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top.
You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

title: Contact Us
features: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
Email: privacy@undiscoveredrecruits.com
